name: Hyper Neon Delta
description:
Single Player 80s Vapourwave inspired arcade game!

We at TeamAppiePie work as a team of 5. Unfortunately, we had some short comings on the programming side with unforeseen illness and we couldn't adapt effectively. We got something out with the knowledge we had. Enjoy our 80s arcade game!

  • Move the player by pressing space to dash in the direction of the mouse!
  • Hit the bullet to ricochet it using your player triangle!
  • Each bounce of the bullet reduces its velocity!
  • The bullet has 7 bounces! Don't let it stop or the game ends!
  • Survive to gain points slowly!
  • Hit the squares to gain 100 points!
